get.description:
Authorization token is mandetory to conusme any api of wakau app 
 
 1.get plain new public token using appSign and plateform 
 2.get new user token using userCode 
 3.refresh existing expired or active token using old token

status.description: (status of content) 0=> pending, 1=> active, -1=> deleted, -2=> blocked

isAllowComment.description: If content should be allowed to have comments. 1=> allowed, 0=> not allowed

isAllowDownload.description: If content should be allowed to download.  1=> allowed, 0=> not allowed
